Name: P.S. I Love You
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Crumble a piece of Cadbury's Flake over the cocktail.
Review: P.S. You'll love this creamy, slightly sweet dessert cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of P.S. I Love You contains 293 calories
